methodology: Web search validation of filtered novel predictions

evidence.summary: Naproxen showed 'no significant influence on fasting glucose levels' in diabetics
evidence.related_finding: Salsalate (different NSAID) showed 0.53% A1c reduction, but naproxen did not
evidence.concern: NSAIDs increase cardiovascular risk in diabetics (JACC 2023)

validated_predictions.actionability: NONE - no evidence of benefit, potential harm

evidence.summary: Phase III trials with IGF-1R inhibitors FAILED in breast cancer
evidence.mechanism: Could overcome tamoxifen resistance in ER+ breast cancer in preclinical models
evidence.key_finding: TNBC: 'did not block tumour formation and had no effect on tumour growth in vivo'

evidence.summary: Large-scale clinical trials showed inconsistent/disappointing results
evidence.meta_analysis: No significant association between vitamin E consumption and breast cancer risk
evidence.key_insight: γ-tocopherol and δ-tocopherol may be more effective than α-tocopherol

validated_predictions.actionability: NONE - clinical evidence does not support

evidence.summary: Never tested for MS - all clinical trials were in oncology (ovarian, renal cancer)
evidence.mechanism: Anti-α5β1 integrin antibody with anti-angiogenic properties

validated_predictions.actionability: NONE - mechanism not relevant to MS

evidence.summary: Preclinical evidence shows cardioprotective effects via sGC activation
evidence.mechanism: Pharmacological preconditioning preserves cardiac function after heart transplant in rat models
evidence.key_finding: Improved LV contractility, reduced nitro-oxidative stress and apoptosis
evidence.historical: Helsinki Heart Study showed coronary heart disease prevention

validated_predictions.actionability: MEDIUM - preclinical support, could warrant clinical investigation

evidence.summary: Already FDA-approved for COPD as monotherapy and in combinations
evidence.note: Approved in Trelegy Ellipta (triple therapy) and as Incruse Ellipta

validated_predictions.actionability: NONE - already standard of care (ground truth gap)

evidence.summary: Potent antihypertensive effects via dopamine receptor activation confirmed
evidence.mechanism: Central dopamine receptor stimulation + presynaptic inhibition of norepinephrine
evidence.preclinical: Lowered BP in spontaneously hypertensive rats, DOCA-salt models
evidence.CRITICAL: WITHDRAWN FROM US MARKET (2007) due to cardiac valve regurgitation risk

validated_predictions.actionability: NONE - drug withdrawn due to safety concerns

evidence.summary: RCT showed greater progression-free survival with lovastatin + thalidomide/dex
evidence.population_study: SEER-Medicare: 45.6% of MM patients used statins, associated with reduced mortality
evidence.mechanism: t(4;14) MM cells sensitive to lovastatin-induced apoptosis
evidence.2024_review: Cancer Reports recognizes statins as repurposed anti-cancer agents

validated_predictions.actionability: HIGH - existing clinical trial evidence supports use

summary.key_discovery: Lovastatin → Multiple Myeloma has RCT evidence for improved PFS

new_filter_recommendations.action: Add withdrawn drug list to confidence filter
